title.en: An Aspiration to be Reborn in the Land of Turquoise Leaves

text.en: Namo guru ārya tārāyai
text.en-trans: namo guru arya tareye

text.en: My own perception is the supreme realm of perfect purity,
text.en-trans: rang nang nampar dakpé zhing kham chok

text.en: Self-arisen and spontaneously perfect, with a vast golden ground,
text.en-trans: rangjung lhundrup ser gyi sa zhi dal

text.en: Bathing waters and pools that possess the eight qualities,
text.en-trans: yenlak gyeden trü dang dzingbu khyil

text.en: Trees, flowers and fruits of many kinds,
text.en-trans: shing dang metok drebu natsok min

text.en: Birds and wild animals who proclaim the Dharma,
text.en-trans: cha dang ridak mangpö chödra drok

text.en: The sweetest perfumed incense filling all directions,
text.en-trans: chok nam tamché dri sung pö ngé dang

text.en: And divine youths, male and female,
text.en-trans: lha yi pu dang pumo natsok kyi

text.en: Who constantly offer gifts and words of praise.
text.en-trans: chöpa dumé taktu chö ching tö

text.en: In the centre, upon a carpet of jewels,
text.en-trans: dé ü rinchen natsok chel tram ü

text.en: Is an immense mansion of lapis lazuli,
text.en-trans: bendurya lé drubpé zhal yé khang

text.en: A spontaneously arisen palace, delightful to behold.
text.en-trans: rangjung podrang nyamga ta na duk

text.en: Transparent inside and out, it is square with four main doors,
text.en-trans: chi sal nang sal dru zhi go zhiwa

text.en: And has steps, porticoes, dharma-wheels, banners of victory, parasols,
text.en-trans: ta bab chö khor gyaltsen duk dang ni

text.en: Ornaments and all the proper surroundings and features.
text.en-trans: gyen dang khoryuk tsen nyi rab dzok ü

text.en: In its centre, upon a lotus and full moon symbolizing non-attachment and immaculate purity,
text.en-trans: ma chak kyön dral pé da gyépé teng

text.en: Is noble Tārā, born from the victorious buddhas’ compassion.
text.en-trans: gyalwé tukjé lé trung pakma drol

text.en: She is blue-green, with one face and two hands — swift to act, peaceful and resplendent.
text.en-trans: ngo jang zhal chik chak nyi nyur zhi pal

text.en: In vivid, radiant splendour, she presides.
text.en-trans: lhang nge lhen ne lham mer zhuk pa la

text.en: Surrounding her are buddhas and bodhisattvas,
text.en-trans: khor du sangyé chang chub sempa dang

text.en: Her twenty-one forms, and hundreds and thousands of ḍākinīs,
text.en-trans: drolma nyer chik bum trak khandrö kor

text.en: All proclaiming the Dharma of Secret Mantra without interruption,
text.en-trans: sang ngak chö dra gyün ché mepar drok

text.en: Their wisdom minds filled with great love and compassion.
text.en-trans: tukjé tsewa chenpö gong té rol

text.en: Throughout this and all our future lives
text.en-trans: dak sok di né tsé rab tamché du

text.en: We will hold you, precious Lady, as our special deity
text.en-trans: jetsün ma khyö lhakpé lhar zung né

text.en: And with body, speech and mind in unison, devotedly pray:
text.en-trans: go sum chik dril dépé solwa dep

text.en: Outwardly maintaining the conduct of individual liberation and the bodhisattvas,
text.en-trans: chi na sor chang chöpa kyong tsul dang

text.en: And inwardly manifesting the supreme path of the two stages
text.en-trans: nang na zabmo dorje tekpa yi

text.en: Of the profound Vajra vehicle, without error,
text.en-trans: ma nor rim nyi lam chok ngön gyur né

text.en: Let us swiftly gain victory in the battle over the four māras.
text.en-trans: nyur du dü zhi'i yul lé gyalwar dzö

text.en: In happiness or sorrow, whatever befalls us, good or bad,
text.en-trans: kyi dam duk gam lek nyé chi jung yang

text.en: O precious Tārā, care for us!
text.en-trans: jetsün drolma khyerang khyen lakpé

text.en: Grant us the power and capacity to mature and liberate our own minds!
text.en-trans: dak gyü min ching drolwé tu nü tsol

text.en: From the moment we set out upon the supreme path of the unsurpassed vehicle,
text.en-trans: lamé tekpé lam chok la zhuk tsé

text.en: Cause our qualities of experience and realization to grow!
text.en-trans: nyam tok yönten gong du pelwa dang

text.en: Help us to attain the paths and stages without going astray!
text.en-trans: göl chuk mepé sa lam ngön gyur né

text.en: And, without ever wavering from the clear light of our own awareness,
text.en-trans: rang rig ösal ngang lé mi yowar

text.en: To attain enlightenment as the primordially pure Samantabhadra!
text.en-trans: kadak kuntu zangpor sangyé shok

text.en: In short, may I and all other beings, infinite in number,
text.en-trans: dor na dak dang tayé semchen kun

text.en: By thinking of you, O precious Tārā,
text.en-trans: jetsün ma khyö yi la sampa yi

text.en: Be reborn directly, without an intervening birth,
text.en-trans: kyewa zhen gyi bar ma chöpa ru

text.en: In the supreme Land of Turquoise Leaves!
text.en-trans: zhing chok yulo kö du kyewar shok

text.en: And, having taken birth there, receive the prophecy of enlightenment.
text.en-trans: zhing der kyé né lungten rab tob té

text.en: Then, through vast, ocean-like activity to tame the difficult,
text.en-trans: dül ka dül chir trinlé gyatso yi

text.en: May we guide others, each according to their needs,
text.en-trans: gang la gang dül dé la der tün gyi

text.en: And thereby empty the three realms of saṃsāra from their very depths.
text.en-trans: kham sum khorwa dong truk nüpar shok

text.en: Through the truth of the utterly pure dharmatā
text.en-trans: chönyi nampar dakpé denpa dang

text.en: And the infallible reality of cause and effect,
text.en-trans: chöchen gyudré lumé denpa yi

text.en: May there be no obstacle to the fulfilment of this aspiration,
text.en-trans: mönpé dön la barché mi jung zhing

text.en: And may all our wishes swiftly come to perfect fruition.
text.en-trans: nyur du ré dré yong su drub gyur chik

text.en: By exerting yourself in this continually
text.en-trans: di na gyun du tsön gyur na

text.en: You will be accepted by the supreme deity,
text.en-trans: lhamo chok gi jé zung né

text.en: And, independently of the dying process,
text.en-trans: chiwé lam la mi töpar

text.en: Manifest the realization of clear light,
text.en-trans: ösal gongpa ngön gyur né

text.en: Seizing the stronghold of the dharmakāya.
text.en-trans: chökü tensi zin gyur ro
